column1: Total Ministry of Health & Family Welfare

column5: PMSSY is the scheme for “establishment of AIIMS type super-speciality hospitals-cum-teaching institutions and upgrading of State Government hospitals”

The 2016-17(BE) figure includes an allocation of Rs.100 crore for the RSBY under the Ministry of Health & Family Welfare. Erstwhile RSBY is now divided into two distinct components - Social Security for the unorganised workers and provision for health services. The card would be provided by Ministry of Labour and Employment and the health services would be provided by Ministry of Health & Family Welfare.
